website_summaries.verdict: Low price per ounce versus some other powders, but its protein levels are a little lower too.
pros: Offered in several different flavors, giving you plenty of options to find a favorite
Formula is designed to promote muscle growth and recovery after workouts, but it also fits in with cardio workout regimens
For those who want carbs in a protein powder, this product has 15 grams per serving
cons: Delivers 22 grams of protein per serving, which is a little less than some others

customer_reviews.title: Great Protien Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a month now and it is great! I started working out in August and I finally decided that I’m not being satisfied with my result so I’ll just invest in a protein powder. It was hard choosing and getting so many references made it even harder. I chose to go with Syntha 6 and it was a great decision, I love this flavor and if you follow the scoop with 4 oz rule the flavor taste great!! I also started seeing results! I am lifting much more weight, and my body isn’t as tired as normal when I get done lifting ! Great product! Can’t wait to try other flavors
customer_reviews.author: Klr1996

customer_reviews.title: Why the change in product?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the same stuff for 2 years off Amazon, same type, same flavor, same everything. This time there is something different, 1) the powder doesn't dissolve like it used to (I'm not using a blender, just a blender bottle and it doesn't work right anymore). 2) the taste is bitter now, it use to be super sweet and that's the only sugar I have but this doesn't taste right anymore. 3) any time I open the bottle it's like a dust storm comes up from it, old stuff wasn't like that. Guess everyone is going to cheaper quality while they jack up the prices. So sad cause this was my favorite. Got to find something else now ....
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: great flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein powder. My favorite is the vanilla ice cream flavor. I start my day with a Protein shake (one ounce of powder mixed in 3 oz water, shake, then add lots of ice and top off with 3 oz skim milk). Best ever - gets my day off to a great start.
customer_reviews.author: BMD

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Same Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this product and using it for years now. This most recent order I placed seemed to change the flavor and consistency. The past few packages came with a label saying "New look, same formula". While this appeared to be true initially, the most recent one tastes incredibly watery, and no longer has that milkshake flavor. It tastes almost like really really badly watered down milk. I had some of the old batch, tried that, tasted great. Whatever they have done recently though, their formula is changed and it is no longer the great product I once loved.
customer_reviews.author: Nic P

customer_reviews.title: The best protein out there
customer_reviews.text: I've been through several brands over the last 10 years or so of using protein supplements. Was (and still am) a big fan of Gold Standard Whey Protein but of all the brands I've tried this has been by far my favorite, and the best tasting. If you mix it with milk and an ice cube in a ninja blender it seriously tastes (and has the consistency) of a milkshake. It does have a higher carb count than other proteins that are non-mass building but seriously, 15 grams in this (versus 3-5 grams in the other brands) per serving is nothing if you're not cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Claudicate

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is always a balance to try to find quality ingredients at a good price that also taste good. This is a very good product for the money and tastes really, really good. The chocolate taste like chocolate ice cream and the vanilla taste just like vanilla ice cream. I get no indigestion or after burping from this product. I get no gas or bloating. I am pretty well educated when it comes to food ingredients in food science. Yes, there are better products on the market but they are quite a bit more expensive and they just do not taste good. This is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: bunny reads

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite protein powders
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! I’m always worried about trying new protein powders, but I was pleasantly surprised with this one. I received a chocolate sample in the mail, misplaced it, but decided to give them a shot anyways. It’s delicious and perfect for after a workout or if I don’t have time for lunch. Definitely will keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: H. Cibor

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla flavor is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Tried the chocolate peanut butter which was pretty tasty, but I’m a vanilla guy and this nailed it! Obviously want to make sure this is the product for you, but if you’re already at that point and deciding on a flavor, I recommend this one. Mixes fairly well in a shaker with just water. I make mine with a lot more water than is suggested, but it’s still plenty flavorful. Has a few chunks that don’t quite mix up, but they’re just like little balls of vanilla ice cream, so it doesn’t bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: ScranScran

customer_reviews.title: Will order more
customer_reviews.text: One of or if not the best protein supplement I've ever tasted. It mixes easily, and has your different types of protein such as whey, egg, and casein( you're slow digesting proteins) along with healthy fats and a little bit of potassium and a decent amount of calcium. This isn't a lot of vitamins and minerals, but I just take a multivitamin for that. Also, there is very little sugar and still taste great. I've worked at health stores before and tried numerous proteins, to me this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but will not recommend for long term consumption
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 flavors of this protein powder which includes cake batter, vanilla and chocolate cake batter. I enjoyed the taste, but am concerned with many unnecessary ingredients and artificial sugar. Since whey protein is something I consume daily, I am more pickier with my choices. I rather spend a few more bucks and get something sweetened with stevia or get an unflavored protein and flavor it myself. The manufacturer doesn't hide it, so they are not to blame as there are many protein powders that is artificially flavored and sweetened. The protein powder does what it is suppose to, but I don't recommend it for long term consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, low on sugar, high on protein!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I’ve only tried the vanilla ice cream flavor, but it’s delicious! I’ve tried other products that never mix well in a shaker cup, always leaving you with those powder bombs as you drink it. This powder blends perfectly in just the shaker cup after only a few shakes. It’s low on sugar and high on flavor! It’ll make you even more motivated to workout knowing this treat of a recovery drink is just waiting for you! Definitely try this if you’re looking for a delicious, well blending protein powder with no unnecessary fillers!
customer_reviews.author: mrsdoc0924

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Awful and Will Ruin Your Bowel Movements
customer_reviews.text: This does not taste pleasant. Maybe the other flavors do?The only reason I ordered it because it was on sale and had plenty of good reviews. I’ve had other protein powders that don’t taste like suffering. I also want to add that my farts started smelling horrendous after drinking it one time. Not only that, but my bowels have suffered as well. Must be all the processed junk others have complained about that is destroying my insides. Even if this tasted good I don’t think it’d be worth taking for that alone.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product Line
customer_reviews.text: I’ve come back for more and now my wife keeps stealing this after she works out. The healing opportunity due to the ingredients are worth every penny. Of the literal dozens of products I’ve tried over the years, I keep coming back to this product line and keep getting excellent results. I’m in my 40’s and a father to young children. I want to continue to train and set the right example by showing my kids to stay active all their lives. I will admit that treating my body like an amusement park over the past few decades hasn’t made life any easier, but having solid products to back your play is always a solid option.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the first protein powder I've tried that I've actually enjoyed! I'm no nutritionist so I can't speak to the efficacy of the ingredients, but it seems very well-reviewed on that front by people who are. As far as actually having to ingest this stuff, it's just awesome. It doesn't just taste tolerable, it's actually good in just water! I used to have to add sugar or mix protein powder in milk to make it tolerable but this stuff tastes great (Vanilla Ice cream flavor). It also mixes WHEY easier than any other product I've used. It mixes just fine with a regular shaker bottle and cold water. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes and Mixes Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste and ease of mixing. Know that with the many tastes of Syntha 6, you'll get the taste it says it is - it won't simply be vanilla if you get vanilla ice cream or chocolate if you get chocolate cake batter, so make sure you want the taste you are ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i can say is the flavor is sooo gooooooooodddd!!!!! only problem is i did not know about casein protein when i purchased this product so be aware that casein sits in your stomach and does not digest right away. I am also lactose intolerant and casein protein really bothers me apparently. none the less i know people who use this protein and have no problems, i wish i could continue to use this protein but sadly i cannot.
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and mixes well. I really like the flavors of the Sytha 6 product. It mixes well in a shaker bottle and always tastes great. This is my main protein powder I have been using Syntha 6 for years now. Great tasting protein powder. The only one I did not care for was the Birthday Cake remix version made Coldstone Creamery selection. It had sprinkles in it. Those always fell to the bottom of the shaker bottle are were pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flavorless and a little thin
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this protein. But the vanilla doesn't really taste like much of anything, and the shake comes out pretty thin. Once, I added ice, and it clumped (despite using a Vitamix) so I had to run the blender twice. I tried different types of milk but it comes out thin and flavorless all the same. It's good a good mix of protein/fat/carbs for after a good workout, but it's not particularly enjoyable to drink.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Love their protein powder! Tried several of their flavors, but I'm basic... so this is definitely my favorite flavor so far!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sytsma

customer_reviews.title: The Taste is Good
customer_reviews.text: Read articles saying this is "bad" protein. I have been consuming protein for decades. This is one of the few out there that is enjoyable enough to consume. Flavor over elevated sugar content is Worth It. Most taste so bad you avoid them.
customer_reviews.author: Northern in the South

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best flavor
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this protein for years, and so glad I can order it through Amazon now. The chocolate peanut butter flavor is the absolute best, you get little pieces of chocolate inside. It feels like a treat after a workout or as a meal replacement. We have tried over 40 different types of proteins over the years and this is always our go to.
customer_reviews.author: R  L

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Mixes Well with Milk
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased this product off Amazon for almost 3 years I never had a problem and loved the product. However, my last purchase, and now final purchase, does not properly mix with milk anymore. I contacted BSN directly and provided the lot and batch number from the container as I was sure something had changed with the recipe as it is now a messy, clumpy mixture and very pasty and hard to drink with milk (see photos). BSN indicated in a letter to me that the batch was checked and was fine (it's not fine??). I fine this very hard to believe so buyer beware. I am now researching other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't taste like right.
customer_reviews.text: Something is not right with this particular productive bought from this vendor. Of all the ones I bought this is the only time I have has to complain about. Even the labels seem different. It does not taste like vanilla ice cream Doesn't blend well has clumps. It's like was not airtight. Will not be buying from this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Balmy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Filling and Works
customer_reviews.text: I like to take one of these shakes after a workout and it is works wonderfully in terms of recovery and even as a meal replacement on off days. I am not worried about calorie intake at this time as I have a bit of trouble consuming enough each day but here is it what I do with it. 2 Scoops a cup of ice a cup of milk (your choice, I use 2%) a banana 5G BCAA 5G Glutamine Blend it Sometimes I add berries. Overall I have been using Syntha 6 for years so I am partial to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bules

customer_reviews.title: Good product poor customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This protein is wonderful for a complete breakfast drink, just add a banana, some berries, and a handful of spinach.....complete to start your day! The delivery on the other hand left something to be desired..... The delivery man dropped it on the lawn strip next to mailbox, if I hadn't watched him do this I doubt very much if I would have ever received that shipment! I would have preferred calling or texting customer service at Amazon ..... I could not find a number to call!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot stir
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and thick but it doesn’t mix well with a spoon. I mix espresso and protein shake in the morning and don’t want to mix this in a blender bottle beforehand. It’s good but not my jam. Pumpkin spice tastes exactly what you think it tastes like. I think a 5 serving size is enough for this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: E. N. M.

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this powder in the vanilla ice cream flavor for the past 7 months and have loved it. This last order tasted so vile that I can't drink it I don't like to be out of it so ordered a different flavor, hoping that it's not nasty tasting.
customer_reviews.author: toupeebob

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and yet it works, pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the tastiest protein powder i have ever used. Amazingly good! Usually tho, the better it tastes, the worse the product... Fortunately, this is not the case with this one, my results are noticeable, softer hair, smooth skin, strong nails, and my muscle definition is on point. Very impressed with this bsn product😃👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good Protein Supplement for Work
customer_reviews.text: I drink a shake in the morning and another one throughout my shift working. I work 11 hours in a distribution center order picking. I like to drink another shake after work. This product was appealing because of the protein isolate (higher protein ratio to weight) and the inclusion of casein. My breaks are 3 hours in between so the micellar casein fulfilled my requirement for a protein absorption rate over longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vang

customer_reviews.title: RE: ChocPeanut - Consistant Flavor, Mixes Well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this particular flavor for a while, I prefer it over the Strawberry shake. It took a lot of effort for me to finish that canister... I actually look forward to these shakes. The protein dissolves well in milk with a regular shaker bottle in my experience, which is great. I have used proteins in the past that might as well have been cut with cement.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Easily my favorite protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I've drank a lot of different protein shakes in my day and BSN Syntha-6 has the best taste of any I've tried (hands down). Using a protein powder to supplement once a day is tough if you have to choke it down due to poor taste. I actually look forward to drinking these after my workouts. Until I hear of some new earth-shattering, amazing, protein powder - I'll continue with BSN. Extremely impressed thus far.
customer_reviews.author: RyRob

customer_reviews.title: Like a Drug.  Oh wait...
customer_reviews.text: There are three supplements I might be clinically addicted to: 1. BioRhythm Afterglow (post workout only) 2. MuscleTech Phase 8 (Peanut Butter Chocolate flavor) 3. BSN Syntha-6 (Chocolate Cake Batter) This stuff hits the spot during the work day when I have to sneak a snack between meals. The slower release proteins are very effective to keep your body primed all day to build muscle. While I wouldn't take this stuff immediately after a workout because of its slow release proteins, I would DEFINITELY recommend this throughout the day. It's not bad at night either, to keep your body building muscle instead of breaking it down.
customer_reviews.author: Roanoke9000

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate cake batter is yum!
customer_reviews.text: Yum! Best tasting protein I’ve tried! Chocolate cake batter really fills that chocolate craving I get at night. Stops the craving dead in its tracks. The added fiber and low sugar makes me feel full for a long time. It’s 200 calories but it doesn’t need anything more than water. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: HouseCat

customer_reviews.title: Not a full container?
customer_reviews.text: I just got this item delivered to me yesterday. I've tried this protein powder before, so I know I like it. I was just shocked at how much empty space was in the container... I would have sworn someone opened it if I hadn't taken off the plastic seal. Also thought it was odd that there was no seal inside once you open the lid, ya know? But tastes good nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I have used Syntha-6 Vanilla Ice Cream for several years and really enjoyed my daily drink. I just finished my first glass of the new formula and it didn't taste good at all, and the chemical aftertaste is terrible. It also made me feel bloated. I never thought that I would ever look for a different protein mix, but I am now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing scoop
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tasting protein powder as approved by my verrrry picky 14yo son. I’ve given it 3 stars because unfortunately, it didn’t come with a scoop. This proved to be a bit of a pain because I had to weigh out 47g and figure out how much to scoop out of a measuring cup each time.
customer_reviews.author: sskramer1

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning after my workout. It’s a great way to start my day since I wake up to be at the gym by 5. I have noticed that I am gaining muscles too. I was never a breakfast person, but with the level of workouts I began doing, I needed something.
customer_reviews.author: Haijai4

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and cost
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Easy to mix with a mixing ball and shaker. I haven't tried mixing it in a cup...and I dont know anybody that tries mixing powders in a cup. I've used BSN, and Muscle Milkfor over 15 years. Never had any issues with them. Can't go wrong with any of them
customer_reviews.author: Al E

customer_reviews.title: Good Meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert on protein powder bulking up VS meal replacement. That being said this doesn't taste grainy and is easy to drink. I will say I made this with water vs skim milk one day and it was very hard for me to drink. I may stick with protein bars from Costco once this is finished but all in all the product isnpretty good for the price, it has 21 g of protein and is 200 calories per scoop, with only 5-6 ounces and a typical shake for me is at least 8 ounces but I have to make them smaller since I don't want to go over 300 calories per shake.
customer_reviews.author: jnj9612

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Terrible And Gave Me Upset Stomach
customer_reviews.text: There has been a formula change for sure as I've used this on and off for almost ten years now and when I recently purchased a new batch it began upsetting my stomach and ruining my workouts, be careful using this.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. Take it to get extra protein. One scoop per 6 oz of milk will be all you need to get out there and hit a homer for the big game the next day. A scoop and a half per 7 oz of milk and you'll be going home with the cheerleader. Take 2 scoops with 8 oz of raw milk straight from the cows udder and merge with all matter and become the baseball game...good product.
customer_reviews.author: Flex &R

customer_reviews.title: High quality protein for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good tasting protein that has many other proteins in it high-quality I find I definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Markovich

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!! Yum!! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this powder!! Chocolate cake batter is that best flavor ever!! Literally tastes like it. No powdery or chalky taste/residue. Mixes well with just water - or even better, try with almond milk!! High quality product. Worth the $$!
customer_reviews.author: haley overby

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying a product from BSN and loved the taste. I found my new favorite protein powder. I bought the Vanilla Ice Cream flavor and tried it as a shake with milk, a banana, frozen blueberries, frozen strawberries and loved it. My favorite flavor has to be strawberry and least is the banana flavor from the three flavors I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Both dog's got sick
customer_reviews.text: My dogs threw up right after they ate and during. I'm not going to try it. My dogs have had 2 other brands of whey protein and several different protein powders and drinks and never got sick. There's a lot of ingredients in this powder than others I used in past.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Means

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting vanilla protein I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: I've been exercising for many years now and tried multiple protein powders. I have never tried a Syntha 6 flavor that was not good, but this Vanilla Ice Cream is absolutely awesome. When mixed with Vanilla Almond Milk it taste similar to Blue Bell Vanilla Ice Cream. I also mix is with cooked sweet potatoes for a great tasting post workout dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Meh tasting.
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is easily the worst of several that I've tried. It does taste vaguely like a cinnamon bun, I'll give it that, but not in a pleasant way. It is the easiest flavor to mix into water; however, it's a chore to drink and I regret not purchasing the chocolate peanut butter, which is vastly superior.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: BSN is great...but...
customer_reviews.text: BSN products are awesome but I’m going to be petty anyway! Please fill the container more than half way or use a smaller container, it’s very disappointing to see the container half empty when you open it and don’t put the scoop at the very bottom, the whole treasure hunt thing to find the scoop can get messy. That’s it, keep making great products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great meal replacement, or protein shake for workouts. Tastes fantastic too!! Some reviews are bad for this due to it having more calories, or carbs compared to other brands of protein powder. In this case then go with a leaner muscle building powder with less calories/ carbs. There are many different options for protein powders for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Splawski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste and consistency
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein powder. It creates a true milkshake style smoothie. Wish it has some more fiber to be a little more filling, but other than that no complaints. All the flavors I have tried are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: Basics: It mixes well with thewith no lumps or clumps It blends well with milk, water, or a combination of the two (my preference) Works equally well for post work out supplement or as a meal replacement Container opening is appropriately sized so that you don’t get powder all over your hands Chocolate cake batter flavor was well liked by me and my wife (very important) Overall this is a great protein shake mix.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Great product but was it miss packaged?
customer_reviews.text: Synths 6 is the best tasting protein I’ve had and I’ve been lifting and using different supplements for 15 years. However this tub came with white powder on the lid and the plastic seal around lid. When I opened it there was no freshness seal on top the jar. This was alarming...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brown

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter: 10/10
customer_reviews.text: The Chocolate Peanut Butter flavor is delicious and mixes perfectly. I mix two scoops of this with low-fat milk after my workout, and it helps a lot with recovery and muscle synthesis.
customer_reviews.author: Agility

customer_reviews.title: Great and crumby at the same time
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate peanut butter flavor is fantastic, and quite possibly the best tasting protein I’ve ever bought. Just one scoop with 4-5 ounces of water makes a filling shake post-workout. What makes it only four stars though are the annoying cookie crumbs that are added in to the blend. They serve no purpose for the shake, and most of them end up sticking to the inside of my blender bottle and make it more difficult to clean afterwards. Eliminate the useless crumbs and this gets 5 stars easily.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Ahamed

customer_reviews.title: Great-tasting and no clumping
customer_reviews.text: This is one great-tasting powder. After having less than desirable results with my first protein powder, I took the time and was sure of what I wanted to buy before throwing cash out the door again. This mix is well worth your money. Not only does it provide you with your daily protein needs, but it tastes exceptional, too! The formula doesn't clump with my mixer () either, while the previous mix would almost always have at least a few nasty clumps of powder for me to choke through. Tasty, smooth and worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: Nick W.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and testes great
customer_reviews.text: I mix my shakes with naked pb, milk, ice, and chocolate syrup. This powder mixes well in my blender although I've never tired to mix it in a shaker. The flavor is great. My only complaint is that it has 200 calories per serving when other brands only have 120 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ray N

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein!!
customer_reviews.text: Great time release protein! Higher on cals, carbs, and fat, but I use it in the morning to kickstart my body's protein synthesis. It's made up of fast and slow digesting not proteins, so it will keep your body rebuilding muscle for hours. Oh and it's also the best tasting protein I've ever had. It tastes so good I actually look forward to getting out of bed and having my morning shake. Also, I don't see any of the fillers that artificially spike protein numbers. Appears to be all complete proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot if heavy weight lifting and I needed a good protein drink that would not only help with recovery but also growth. This had exactly what I was looking for. Tastes great (chocolate peanut butter), has whey protein and casein protein, and mixes well with no chunks. I would highly recommend this for anyone that is tired of not enjoying their protein and wants to actually get a good drink. I can't say enough good things about this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Protein Powder  Period
customer_reviews.text: I have been using BSN's Syntha-6 protein powders for a little over a year now, and have nothing but great things to say. My favorite flavor is Chocolate Peanut Butter and mixes really well with either water or skim milk (if you want to tack on a little extra protein) Taste is phenomenal.... Doesn't even taste 'healthy' which I guess is one of the reasons I like it so much. Foritified with BCAAs and other good things, bottom line is good taste and results. I would recommend adding powder l-glutamine @5g to your pre-and post workout shakes Can't go wrong. Plus the price on Amazon, especially with Subscribe and Save rocks....
customer_reviews.author: C.S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best tasting protein I’ve had. It keeps the muscle on and you feel satisfied after a shake. Mix it with some Orange Juice and you’ll have a delicious Orange dream shake. Blend it with some açaí juice and ice and it’s a açaí smoothie. Love this protein, Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kristopher q.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again, super good👍
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Upon opening it smelled so delicious! And it tastes sooo delicious! I recommend it to basic people who love pumpkin pie 🥧 🎃
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Torres

customer_reviews.title: Favorite. Best Tasting
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite and best tasting protein powder. We're purist and usually order vanilla...or chocolate if we're feeling crazy. But it's nice to know that it comes in so many flavors. I'm eyeing the banana...
customer_reviews.author: MemlyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Is good
customer_reviews.text: I always chose the flavor of chocolate but for a change I chose this flavor and I don't regret very good flavor and it mixes more easily
customer_reviews.author: Rafael. Jose. C. E.

customer_reviews.title: Protein Powder Greats!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the confused customer, that's me, when trying to purchase a good protein powder. It has the right amount of daily supplements and has more servings than others. Tastes great with water too. No need to blend. I'm using the shaker. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Marcho

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a milkshake
customer_reviews.text: This protein is some of the best I've had. I have tried a couple other Syntha-6 flavors such as Vanilla Ice Cream, Strawberry and Chocolate, and I always come back to this one. I don't need to add anything other than water and ice to the mixture and it tastes like a milk shake. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yhea

customer_reviews.title: Nice milkshake but...
customer_reviews.text: I mix it to the milk or almond milk and it tastes fine. But somehow I fart a lot after drinking it. I googled and found out that it might not be digested well, so I think the formula might not be ideal for me. But it's just my situation, and probably it's good for other people.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor
customer_reviews.text: My husband claims this is like drinking a delicious chocolate milk. From someone who rarely eats healthy or consumes protein, he wanted to drink this for dinner, versus eating a home cooked meal. He swears it's that good- and filling. As far as using this time beef up or gain some nutritional benefit- I assume it works. We'll see if I end up with a muscular hubby 💪
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting Whey I've ever had! Just got it, and I've had used a lot of different protein powders in the past. This is the best! We will see what it can do. I will be back for more! I can honestly say, I am drinking this more often because I like the taste. With milk it really tastes like a milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: NYNative

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a hard time finding good tasting protein powder. This one is good
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fake BSN
customer_reviews.text: This protein is incredibly awful since I started to use it I didn’t see nothing but trouble no gains when you drink it you can taste and feel that this is not the real BSN protein shake
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Broken container and funny taste
customer_reviews.text: Brittle container broke and spilled powder all in my other items. Tasted the powder to see if I wanted to salvage, but it tasted off. I got a refund and will try another product.
customer_reviews.author: BANDERSNATCH

customer_reviews.title: Solid protein mix, good taste and mixability
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good protein powder if you are looking for a product that has a whey/casein mix. The difference is that whey is a fast acting protein, best for right after a workout, and casein a slow acting protein, best for times like before bed because of its slow, sustained release. I like having a variety of different proteins in my protein shakes, so this product suits me well. Mixability: 9/10. Doesn't chunk up when using in a shaker bottle or blender. Taste: 9/10: Vanilla flavor tastes good, can mix into any smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: amber143

customer_reviews.title: The Vanilla Ice Cream flavor tastes really good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vanilla Ice Cream flavor and it tastes really good. I like that it has fiber in it. Will be trying other flavors. I've heard that the casein is supposed to help lower blood sugar and aid in weight loss. I'm hoping that it does. It's great as a snack before bedtime or any other time of day for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: L. Forrer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: Five Star for effectiveness, price, ingredients, mix ability, & taste. Also, I'm comparing this to other proteins I've tried: -Simple Truth Protein Bar -EAS Whey Protein / Lean 15 / Soy -Six Star Whey Protein -Pure Protein Bars -Clif Bars -"Natural" Protein (almonds, cottage cheese, greek yogurt, peanut butter, soy) Keep in mind that this product alone won't bring results. But with added exercise & proper dieting you'll be very impressed. I personally use one scoop of vanilla cream Syntha, 2 bananas, & 2 cups of milk.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond D Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Cant testify on the nutritional benefits or anything, but what I can say is that its absolutely delicious! when you get the water-powder ratio down right its honestly sooo good!
customer_reviews.author: TFox

customer_reviews.title: My body loves this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Love the protein powder. My experience has been great with this product. Since it has multiple types of proteins in it, they break down at different intervals in the human body, I recommend using a metal whisk and fat free milk to make sure the texture is smooth and not chunky. I mix with 10fl.oz of FF milk. Recommend getting this as a daily supplement to maintain muscle mass and control hunger.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Cecilio

customer_reviews.title: Best way to buy is in bulk
customer_reviews.text: Syntha-6 is the best brand out there when it comes to protein powders/mixes. It includes fiber and has the best flavors on the market by far !
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't worthy of how good this flavor was....
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the most delicious flavors ive ever tasted (Vanilla Ice Cream). This tastes just as advertised. It is so good i almost want to return it because i don't deserve to taste something this good in my life. I paired this with a sandwich made by my girlfriend and i almost cried because i thought i was drinking a milkshake and killing my eating habit. Nah, i said to my self. Young man, enjoy yourself a second scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Gee Deuce

customer_reviews.title: tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Mixed in warm milk and taken before bed, this protein drink is wonderful. Helps me sleep through the night. It has to be stirred well with a whisk, so it doesn't clump. Like the taste of the vanilla better than the chocolate, which tastes more like malt balls.
customer_reviews.author: picture taker

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS PROTEIN POWDER, YOU WON’T REGRET IT!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since i started using this product i have been able to get a pump much faster than before, noticed slight size in muscle, and a slight strength increase. i have had no problems with this protein powder at all and another good thing is it can get rid of that annoying muscle soreness fast so you can get back to lifting with out having those annoying pains
customer_reviews.author: Surajnarine P.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite protein powder out there. Doesn’t have that artificial sweet taste and blends well with just about anything. Love this
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as silk
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby and he mixed it with milk and immediately said it was the smoothest, best tasting protein powder he’s ever had. We have used EAS Whey for years, but this brand totally dissolved in the liquid and you don’t even realize it’s in there.
customer_reviews.author: AngieG

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I started working out more intensely a few months ago and didnt have any kind of recovery drink or anything of the sort. I looked up some proteins and found this and though I'd give it a try. It blew me away. It has lessened my recovery time by a considerable amount and makes me feel great throughout the day. Not only that but it tastes great. I've only tried the chocolate peanut butter but I'd give it a 10/10. Mixes great with a shaker cup. No clumps or chalkiness. Just a great protein shake. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: Great protein! Flavor is always good and blends very easy. Carbs are a bit high per serving so if you’re going for a lower carb protein, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love all the BSN products I've tried so far. Its by far the best flavor and disolves the best with the other brands i've tried. This is great to blend up with some frozen fruit. It tastes just like a smoothie with no icky after tastes. I have let the girls in my office try my shakes and 4 of them how by the same brand, either vanilla or chocolate. I will say I have never just had it plain with water. I always blend it with vanilla soy/almond milk and some kind of frozen fruit. But again, compared to several other brands I've tried, this one is hands down the best.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Seems OKay
customer_reviews.text: seems okay can be a little chunky wish it had less sugar and carbs tho
customer_reviews.author: NUSA

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla good, chocolate peanut butter, not so good
customer_reviews.text: I normally but the vanilla but decided to try the chocolate and peanut butter....YUCK!! It tastes terrible and has these grits at the bottom no matter how much I blend it. If you get this stay away from the chocolate peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: ( no it really does) but it also tastes amazing. We use this vanilla birthday cake
customer_reviews.text: So scientifically this stuff works wonders and helps nurish and energize the human body blah blah blah ... ( no it really does) but it also tastes amazing. We use this vanilla birthday cake , some pineapple juice and a little ice to make a super tasty shake which will help me power through my 12 hour shifts when putting actual food in my mouth is not an option .
customer_reviews.author: Jackie B

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Loved this flavor helps cover my sugar craving when I need it! Sad mine didn't come with a scooler for some reason?
customer_reviews.author: ratatataaaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a huge fan of the taste of protein powders, but this one is really good! I’m not a huge fan of chocolate and wanted that tasted good and mixed well with other things, and the vanilla milkshake did the trick. While it does mix well most of the time, sometimes it can be a little chunky. Overall would recommend though!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one at the store but $10 cheaper through amazon. It has a sweet, creamy vanilla ice cream flavor. It’s delicious and easy to blend with anything!
customer_reviews.author: DThompson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This is delicious protein powder! I am not well-versed as to to the efficacy of different ingredients, but my husband and I both use it as a post-workout. We lift heavy weights, but are not bodybuilders. This stuff tastes good and is quality enough for our purposes. We have tried cookies and cream, chocolate peanut butter and chocolate cake batter, and they are all equally delicious. The price is pretty good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor! Eco-friendly shipping! Nothing can beat this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein! I have it every morning with a banana and Silk Almond Milk and it is delicious! I miss it when I’m on vacations, that is how much I like it! In this last shipment, I love it even more as it came without a box! Thanks for taking care of our environment!
customer_reviews.author: jose vizcarrondo

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Great. My favorite so far. A break from chocolate and vanilla. Syntha 6 always taste great, but it's not so clean ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: T3

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste! Works well with my shakes and has helped me tone and lean out with my fitness regimen. Very filling when I put it in my shake. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: As with all these products, hard to tell without comparing to if I did not take, but no known issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but still good
customer_reviews.text: This recently got reviews where an independent test lab found unhealthy heavy metal levels if you consume too much. I'll probably still use it, but only a few times a week. The taste is better than many of the powers I've tried and it mixes well with fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I use this as sugar and cream for my black coffee in the mornings. It takes better than Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: dhan1

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, not overpowering and mixed thoroughly. Can easily mix with pancake powders or yogurts to provide an additional bump in protein. I'll order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality best tasting protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the easiest powders to use, it blends easily wether you use a shaker cup, blender, or a cup and spoon. It also tastes amazing.
customer_reviews.author: rutven leclaire

product_meta.title: BSN SYNTHA-6 Whey Protein Powder, Micellar Casein, Milk Protein Isolate Powder, Vanilla Ice Cream, 48 Servings (Package May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Vanilla Ice Cream| Size:48 ServingsSyntha-6 is an ultra-premium protein powder with 22g protein per serving and is bsn's best-tasting protein on the market. Syntha-6 is the go-to protein for any nutrition or exercise regimen because it is designed to suit a variety of active lifestyles and diet plans. And with syntha-6, the high standard of quality protein comes with taste to match, thanks to bsn's exclusive flavor technology
feature_bullets: Ridiculously delicious : BSN broke through the whey protein flavor barrier once and for all with the introduction of syntha-6
22 gram protein matrix : Consisting of whey protein concentrate, whey protein isolate, calcium caseinate, micellar casein, milk protein isolate, and egg albumin
2-3 gram sugar : While the taste is mind blowing, syntha-6 contains 2-3 gram of sugar per serving depending on flavor
Use any time of day : Post workout, between meals, as a snack, or as a treat, it doesn’t matter. BSN syntha-6 was formulated to be your any time of day protein powder
Protein supplementation : Promotes muscle protein synthesis and recovery support

specifications.Department: GNC|ALL|ALL|PWD DIET W MILK NUT FACT
